attributes.action: Force BT or other land line providers to upgrade lines in Rural Areas to Broadband standard
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Those how live in rural areas too far from the exchange are disadvantaged and can not use BROADBAND.   We need it more than those who live in Urban areas.  Working remotely is more difficult.  We are forced to use our vehicles much more.   More and more the essentials of running a business be it a bank or a farm are depentant of good communitations.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
